title: Bloomberg Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for  Oct. 20
itunes:title: Bloomberg Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for  Oct. 20
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" First Internet Bancorp (INBK). First Internet Bancorp's shares are headed for their biggest gains in two years after well-received results. Earnings beat analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey as the bank completed its first sale of mortgage loans. First Internet set aside less money for loan losses in the quarter than it did a year ago.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
